Interface BitReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BitInputStream

    public interface BitReader

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      boolean bit()
      Read one bit.
      long nrBits()
      Returns the number of bits that have been read from this bitreader.

    • Method Detail

      • bit

        boolean bit()
     throws java.io.IOException
        Read one bit.
        Returns:
        true if it is a 1 bit.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • nrBits

        long nrBits()
        Returns the number of bits that have been read from this bitreader.
        Returns:
        The number of bits read so far.

      • pad

        boolean pad(int factor)
     throws java.io.IOException
        Check that the rest of the block has been padded with zeroes.
        Parameters:
        factor - The size in bits of the block to pad. This will typically be 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256, etc.
        Returns:
        true if the block was zero padded, or false if the the padding contained any one bits.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • read

        int read(int width)
  throws java.io.IOException
        Read some bits.
        Parameters:
        width - The number of bits to read. (0..32)
        Returns:
        the bits
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
